welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dornbirn, Austria! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint city and indulge in the local delicacies. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Dornbirn has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenrhein Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Altenrhein Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
